tool_description: All-in-one global package tracking tool. Support track and trace international 472 couriers.
name: TrackingMore_v2
title: TrackingMore

api_list.name: carriers/list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trackingmore.p.rapidapi.com/carriers/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trackingmore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://trackingmore.p.rapidapi.com/carriers/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trackingmore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you list all the supported carriers for package tracking?
What couriers are available for tracking on TrackingMore?
Show me all the international carriers that TrackingMore supports.

Can you give me a list of all the carriers available for tracking on TrackingMore?
Which international couriers does TrackingMore support for tracking?
Show me the list of all supported carriers for tracking on TrackingMore.

api_list.name: packages/track (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get tracking information of specific package

parameters.name: carrierCode
parameters.description: Carrier code gotten from .../carriers/list or carriers/detect endpoint
